snippet: Mr. Corden, a British actor and comedian, is virtually unknown in the United States, but has amassed a long list of credits in England.
abstract: CBS chooses British actor and comedian James Corden as host of The Late Late Show, replacing Craig Ferguson; Corden is virtually unknown in the United States, but has amassed a long list of credits in England.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Corden, a British actor and comedian, is virtually unknown in the United States, but has amassed a long list of credits in England.

headline.main: James Corden to Replace Craig Ferguson as Host of ‘The Late Late Show’ on CBS
headline.print_headline: CBS Chooses a British Actor and Comedian to Host ‘The Late Late Show’
